verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul Saul בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> be-ma-le-Cho; reigned וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> u-she-Tei two שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> sha-Nim, years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach and when he had reigned עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. over Israel

וַיִּבְחַר־ <WH977> vai-yiv-char- chose ל֨וֹ lo שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul Saul שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet him three אֲלָפִים֮ <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> mi-Yis-ra-'El [men] of Israel וַיִּהְי֨וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- were with שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul were with Saul אַלְפַּ֗יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim, [whereof] two thousand בְּמִכְמָשׂ֙ <WH4363> be-mich-Mas in Michmash וּבְהַ֣ר <WH2022> u-ve-Har and in mount בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֔ל <WH1008> 'El, Bethel וְאֶ֗לֶף <WH505> ve-'E-lef, and a thousand הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> ha-Yu become עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- were with י֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3129> yo-na-Tan, were with Jonathan בְּגִבְעַ֖ת <WH1390> be-giv-'At in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <WH1144> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וְיֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> ve-Ye-ter and the rest הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, of the people שִׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> shil-Lach he sent אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <WH168> le-'o-ha-Lav. to his tent

וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> vai-Yach smote יוֹנָתָ֗ן <WH3129> yo-na-Tan, And Jonathan אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et נְצִ֤יב <WH5333> ne-Tziv the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim of the Philistines אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that was בְּגֶ֔בַע <WH1387> be-Ge-va', that [was] in Geba וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U heard פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim; and the Philistines וְשָׁאוּל֩ <WH7586> ve-sha-'Ul [of it] And Saul תָּקַ֨ע <WH8628> ta-Ka' blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <WH7782> bash-sho-Far the trumpet בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol throughout הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ha-'A-retz throughout all the land לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> yish-me-'U hear הָעִבְרִֽים׃ <WH5680> ha-'iv-Rim. Let the Hebrews

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol All יִשְׂרָאֵ֞ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El And all Israel שָׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> sha-me-'U heard לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, say הִכָּ֤ה <WH5221> hik-Kah had smitten שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> sha-'Ul [that] Saul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נְצִ֣יב <WH5333> ne-Tziv a garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- and also נִבְאַשׁ <WH887> niv-'ash also was had in abomination יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El and [that] Israel בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> bap-pe-lish-Tim; with the Philistines וַיִּצָּעֲק֥וּ <WH6817> vai-yitz-tza-'a-Ku were called together הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> ha-'Am And the people אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul Saul הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <WH1537> hag-gil-Gal. to Gilgal

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֞ים <WH6430> u-fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines נֶאֶסְפ֣וּ׀ <WH622> ne-'es-Fu gathered themselves together לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem to fight עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, with Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim thirty אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand רֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> re-chev chariots וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <WH8337> ve-She-shet and six אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand פָּרָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> pa-ra-Shim, horsemen וְעָ֕ם <WH5971> ve-'Am and people כַּח֛וֹל <WH2344> ka-Chol as the sand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and שְׂפַֽת־ <WH8193> se-fat- shore הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hai-Yam which [is] on the sea לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> la-Ro; in multitude וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu and they came up וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְמִכְמָ֔שׂ <WH4363> ve-mich-Mas, in Michmash קִדְמַ֖ת <WH6926> kid-Mat eastward בֵּ֥ית beit אָֽוֶן׃ <WH1007> 'A-ven. from Bethaven

וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish When the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel רָאוּ֙ <WH7200> ra-'U saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for צַר־ <WH6862> tzar- A strait ל֔וֹ lo, כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for נִגַּ֖שׂ <WH5065> nig-Gas were distressed הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; (for the people וַיִּֽתְחַבְּא֣וּ <WH2244> vai-yit-chab-be-'U did hide הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, ) then the people בַּמְּעָר֤וֹת <WH4631> bam-me-'a-Rot themselves in caves וּבַֽחֲוָחִים֙ <WH2336> u-va-cha-va-Chim thickets וּבַסְּלָעִ֔ים <WH5553> u-vas-se-la-'Im, and in rocks וּבַצְּרִחִ֖ים <WH6877> u-vatz-tze-ri-Chim and in high places וּבַבֹּרֽוֹת׃ <WH953> u-vab-bo-Rot. and in pits

וְעִבְרִ֗ים <WH5680> ve-'iv-Rim, And [some of] the Hebrews עָֽבְרוּ֙ <WH5674> 'a-ve-Ru went over אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den, Jordan אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz to the land גָּ֖ד <WH1410> gad of Gad וְגִלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> ve-gil-'Ad; and Gilead וְשָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> ve-sha-'Ul As for Saul עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> o-Den-nu he still בַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> vag-gil-Gal, he [was] yet in Gilgal וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and all the people חָרְד֥וּ <WH2729> cha-re-Du him trembling אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav. followed

וַיִּיחֶל vai-yi-chel כוַיֹּ֣וחֶל <WH3176> vai-Yo-chel cause to קשִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> ya-Mim, days לַמּוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> lam-mo-'Ed according to the set time אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher set שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El, that Samuel וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- did not בָ֥א <WH935> va came שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El [had appointed] but Samuel הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <WH1537> hag-gil-Gal; not to Gilgal וַיָּ֥פֶץ <WH6327> vai-Ya-fetz were scattered הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and the people מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> me-'a-Lav. and

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, And Saul הַגִּ֣שׁוּ <WH5066> hag-Gi-shu Bring hither אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah a burnt offering וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> ve-hash-she-la-Mim; to me and peace offerings וַיַּ֖עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al And he offered הָעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah. the burnt offering

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <WH3615> ke-chal-lo-To And it came to pass that as soon as he had made an end לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> le-ha-'a-Lot of offering הָעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah, the burnt offering וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El behold Samuel בָּ֑א <WH935> Ba; came וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze went out שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul and Saul לִקְרָאת֖וֹ <WH7122> lik-ra-To to meet לְבָרֲכֽוֹ׃ <WH1288> le-va-ra-Cho. him that he might salute

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El And Samuel מֶ֣ה <WH4100> meh What עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta; What hast thou done וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שָׁא֡וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul ;And Saul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because רָאִיתִי֩ <WH7200> ra-'i-Ti Because I saw כִֽי־ <WH3588> chi- Because נָפַ֨ץ <WH5310> na-Fatz were scattered הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am that the people מֵעָלַ֗י <WH5921> me-'a-Lai, and וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not בָ֙אתָ֙ <WH935> va-ta from me and [that] thou camest לְמוֹעֵ֣ד <WH4150> le-mo-'Ed appointed הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim, not within the days וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> u-fe-lish-Tim and [that] the Philistines נֶאֱסָפִ֥ים <WH622> ne-'e-sa-Fim gathered themselves together מִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <WH4363> mich-Mas. at Michmash

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar, Therefore said עַ֠תָּה <WH6258> 'At-tah Now יֵרְד֨וּ <WH3381> ye-re-Du will come down פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim I The Philistines אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai against הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> hag-gil-Gal, now upon me to Gilgal וּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> u-fe-Nei unto יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo have not חִלִּ֑יתִי <WH2470> chil-Li-ti; and I have not made supplication וָֽאֶתְאַפַּ֔ק <WH662> va-'et-'ap-Pak, I forced וָאַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> va-'a-'a-Leh myself therefore and offered הָעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah. a burnt offering ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- over שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul to Saul נִסְכָּ֑לְתָּ <WH5528> nis-Kal-ta; Thou hast done foolishly לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo have not שָׁמַ֗רְתָּ <WH8104> sha-Mar-ta, thou hast not kept אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִצְוַ֞ת <WH4687> mitz-Vat the commandment יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֔ךְ <WH6680> tziv-Vach, which he commanded כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah, now הֵכִ֨ין <WH3559> he-Chin have established יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh thee for now would the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <WH4467> mam-lach-te-Cha thy kingdom אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El upon Israel עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. ever

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now מַמְלַכְתְּךָ֣ <WH4467> mam-lach-te-Cha But now thy kingdom לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תָק֑וּם <WH6965> ta-Kum; shall not continue בִּקֵּשׁ֩ <WH1245> bik-Kesh hath sought יְהוָ֨ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God ל֜וֹ lo אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish him a man כִּלְבָב֗וֹ <WH3824> kil-va-Vo, after his own heart וַיְצַוֵּ֨הוּ <WH6680> vay-tzav-Ve-hu hath commanded יְהוָ֤ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God לְנָגִיד֙ <WH5057> le-na-Gid him [to be] captain עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo, over his people כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki because לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo have not שָׁמַ֔רְתָּ <WH8104> sha-Mar-ta, because thou hast not kept אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what צִוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> tziv-ve-Cha commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. God פ Peh

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom arose שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El, And Samuel וַיַּ֛עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al and gat him up מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> hag-gil-Gal from Gilgal גִּבְעַ֣ת <WH1390> giv-'At unto Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וַיִּפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> vai-yif-Kod numbered שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, And Saul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am the people הַנִּמְצְאִ֣ים <WH4672> han-nim-tze-'Im [that were] present עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo, about כְּשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> ke-Shesh with him about six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> 'Ish. men

וְשָׁא֞וּל <WH7586> ve-sha-'Ul And Saul וְיוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3129> ve-yo-na-Tan and Jonathan בְּנ֗וֹ <WH1121> be-No, his son וְהָעָם֙ <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am and the people הַנִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> han-nim-Tza [that were] present עִמָּ֔ם <WH5973> 'im-Mam, them יֹשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> yo-she-Vim with them abode בְּגֶ֣בַע <WH1387> be-Ge-va' in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> u-fe-lish-Tim but the Philistines חָנ֥וּ <WH2583> cha-Nu encamped בְמִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <WH4363> ve-mich-Mas. in Michmash

וַיֵּצֵ֧א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came out הַמַּשְׁחִ֛ית <WH7843> ham-mash-Chit And the spoilers מִמַּחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> mi-ma-cha-Neh of the camp פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim of the Philistines שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah in three רָאשִׁ֑ים <WH7218> ra-Shim; companies הָרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> ha-Rosh company אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> 'e-Chad one יִפְנֶ֛ה <WH6437> yif-Neh turned אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- unto דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech unto the way עָפְרָ֖ה <WH6084> 'a-fe-Rah [that leadeth to] Ophrah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz unto the land שׁוּעָֽל׃ <WH7777> shu-'Al. of Shual

וְהָרֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> ve-ha-Rosh company אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad And another יִפְנֶ֔ה <WH6437> yif-Neh, turned דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech the way בֵּ֣ית beit חֹר֑וֹן <WH1032> cho-Ron; [to] Bethhoron וְהָרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> ve-ha-Rosh company אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> 'e-Chad and another יִפְנֶה֙ <WH6437> yif-Neh turned דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech [to] the way הַגְּב֔וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul, of the border הַנִּשְׁקָ֛ף <WH8259> han-nish-Kaf that looketh עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and גֵּ֥י <WH1516> gei to the valley הַצְּבֹעִ֖ים <WH6650> hatz-tze-vo-'Im of Zeboim הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <WH4057> ham-mid-Ba-rah. toward the wilderness ס sa-Mek

וְחָרָשׁ֙ <WH2796> ve-cha-Rash Now there was no smith לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo now no יִמָּצֵ֔א <WH4672> yim-ma-Tze, found בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> be-Chol all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz throughout all the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for; אָמַר 'a-mar כאָמְר֣וּ <WH559> 'a-me-Ru answer קפְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, for the Philistines פֶּ֚ן <WH6435> pen Otherwise יַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> ya-'a-Su make הָעִבְרִ֔ים <WH5680> ha-'iv-Rim, Lest the Hebrews חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev [them] swords א֥וֹ <WH176> o or חֲנִֽית׃ <WH2595> cha-Nit. or spears
